vector-art.title: CLR Fan Art
vector-art.description: I made this vector art for CLR because he inspires my work. I used clean shapes and strong colors to match his look.

vector-art.title: Lil Peep Tribute
vector-art.description: A vector fan art for Lil Peep. His music is soft and emotional, so I used calm colors and simple shapes to show that mood.

vector-art.title: Waiian Fan Art
vector-art.description: A vector fan art of Waiian, a rapper and member of Kartell'em. I used smooth gradients and clean lines to show his strong presence.

vector-art.title: DougBrock x MKGM Collab Art
vector-art.description: A vector fan art for DougBrock, a podcaster, and MKGM, a music producer. I placed both in one clean layout to show their collaboration and vibe.

vector-art.title: Polo Pi Fan Art
vector-art.description: This vector art is for Polo Pi. I used bold contrast and simple shapes to reflect his attitude and style.

vector-art.title: Flowg Fan Art
vector-art.description: A fan art piece for Flowg. I used clean linework and flat, bold colors to capture his stage presence.

vector-art.title: Kartell'em Portrait
vector-art.description: This vector fan art is for Kartell'em, a Filipino hip-hop collective. I used simple forms and smooth details to show their unity and street style.

vector-art.title: Shanti Dope Fan Art
vector-art.description: A vector fan art for Shanti Dope, a Filipino rapper. I mixed calm and strong elements to match the mood of his music.

vector-art.title: Yah Wais & Gudds Duo Art
vector-art.description: A duo fan art of Yah Wais and Gudds. I used active poses and balanced colors so both artists stand out.

vector-art.title: Self Portrait Vector
vector-art.description: A vector self-portrait that shows my style as an artist. I made this to show my growth and what inspires me.
